scripts.patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add -A && git commit -m 'patch new version' && bower version patch && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && git add -A && git commit -m 'minor new version' && bower version minor && git push --tags
scripts.major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && git add -A && git commit -m 'major new version' && bower version major && git push --tags
